==== Meeting Log ====
http://irclogs.ubuntu.com/2012/08/15/%23ubuntu-ca.html#t23:03

=== Minutes ===
* Introductions were made
* <nowiki>[[https://singpolyma.net/|Singpolyma]]</nowiki>'s <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/ubuntu-ca/1842/detail/|workshop]]</nowiki> went well
* <nowiki>[[http://bob.jonkman.ca/blogs/2012/08/14/sysadminday-dinner-pictures/|SysAdminDay Dinner]]</nowiki> was a success
* K-W Ubuntu Hours switching locations
* SoftwareFreedomDay in K-W <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/ubuntu-ca/1909/detail/|on 22 September 2012]]</nowiki> at The Working Centre
* Discussion on Ubuntu Release Party and <nowiki>[[http://fsoss.ca/|FSOSS]]</nowiki> deferred to next month
* Did you know: Ubuntu Hour Kitchener host, Charles !McColm <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~chaslinux|chaslinux]]</nowiki> is a contributor to <nowiki>[[http://fullcirclemagazine.org/|Full Circle Magazine]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[dscassel]]</nowiki> has asked Ubuntu-Locoteams about <nowiki>[[..-..-TeamReports|Team Reports]]</nowiki>
